alt.title: Alternative text
alt.description: A description of the image; required when it has meaning that must be conveyed to the learner. For 'decorative' images, leave this blank

longdescription.title: Long image description
longdescription.help: A long description of the image. This text appear below the image.

large.title: Large
large.description: The large sized image for desktop devices

small.title: Small
small.description: The small sized image for mobile devices

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Text to be displayed as an attribution

_url.title: URL
_url.description: When the graphic is selected this is the url it will follow.

_target.title: Target attribute
_target.description: This targets where to open the link. Acceptable values are '_blank' (opens the linked document in a new window or tab), '_parent' (opens the linked document in the parent frame), '_top' (opens the linked document in the full body of the window) or '_self' (opens the linked document in the same frame as it was selected. If no value is set, the default is '_blank'.

_isScrollable.title: Enable horizontal scrolling
_isScrollable.description: Allow the user to view the 'model answer' if they answer the question incorrectly

_defaultScrollPercent.title: Scroll percent
_defaultScrollPercent.description: 0 is left most, 50 is in the middle, 100 is right most.
